ygData.subject: Re: Bardic Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The mandolin does not have a listed weight.  Is it weightless or is this just an oversight?  I just assumed it was weightless and spent the extra couple
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 14 May 1999, J.M. Capozzi wrote:
>
> Right now, there's no increased or decreased spell effects using different
> instruments of the same class. Was something Geoffrey wanted to implement,
> but never got around to doing. So use a lute to save a few gold, if you
> wish, it's functionally the same as a mandolin.

The mandolin does not have a listed weight. Is it weightless
or is this just an oversight? I just assumed it was
weightless and spent the extra couple gold.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
